project.name: tom.task
project.description:
This file defines an Ant task for running the tom tool. To use it, one must first set the property "org.eventb.core.ast.home" to the location of the "org.eventb.core.ast" source plugin, then import this file in an Ant build script. This will define a new task called "tom". To use that task, write something like:
<tom config="${tom.home}/Tom.xml" srcdir="${src}" destdir="${src}" options="-I ${org.eventb.core.ast.home}/tom" pretty="true"> <include name="**/*.t" /> </tom>
